divs: Sighting DetailsWhile at my daughters soccer practice I just happened to look up into the sky and noticed the two objects moving in the same direction but as they advanced further into the horizon they seem to move further from each other. I have included video taken with my SAMSUNG GIII as video evidence. The focus isn't all that great but you can see two objects in the video. the sky was clear with light cloud cover on the horizon to the SW. Both objects did reflect sun light for a couple of seconds before they vanished into the horizon.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around September 30th 2013
Summary: Two objects side by side but at a distance from each other.
